MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL75 postcode area of Pentraeth, affecting properties in  Pentraeth Industrial Estate and surrounding area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power via generator for those customers still off supply. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the generator is up and running. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.38pm on 31st of March 2021.
